name: meaninglessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has no meaning or importance: Has football ever been described so meaninglessly? Troops were being sacrificed seemingly meaninglessly. See
meaningless
More examplesFewer examplesShe talked meaninglessly to him about whatever came into her head.It's hard to accept that disease can afflict anyone, randomly and meaninglessly.Stripped of their anonymity, reviewers gave meaninglessly bland assessments.
